attributes.action: To change The Scout Assocation to The Royal Scout Assocation.
attributes.additional_details:
The Scout Assocation has been providing for more than the last 100 year,fun,character building,activities and much more for young people run mainly by volunteers.
Next year being The Queens Diamond Jubilee I think it would be appropriate to add the prefix of Royal to our title in recognition of the work carried out by the Scout Assocation's members and the many young people who have enjoyed their Scouting.
Let's make it The Royal Scout Association.
